risks.title: Low Base Compensation
risks.description: The base salary of $55,440 may be lower than industry standard for the role and location.
risks.recommendation: Research market rates for similar roles and negotiate a higher base salary.

risks.title: Broad Non-Compete Scope
risks.description: The non-compete clause covers any business or activity that is in competition with the company, which is very broad in scope.
risks.recommendation: Negotiate to narrow the scope to specific products, services or business lines that directly compete with the company.

risks.title: Perpetual Confidentiality Obligation
risks.description: The confidentiality obligation has a perpetual duration, which may be overly restrictive.
risks.recommendation: Request a time limitation on the confidentiality obligation, such as 3-5 years after termination.

risks.title: Lack of Indemnification Protection
risks.description: The contract does not provide any indemnification protection for the contractor.
risks.recommendation: Negotiate to include indemnification provisions that protect the contractor from liabilities arising from their work for the company.
